name: Hero King Quest: Peacemaker Prologue
description:
A short "classic" JRPG. Play the role of the Dark Lord's sister, slay the Hero King, and take the first step in conquering humankind.

Features



A classic RPG…or is it?
Although set up as a typical hero versus dark lord story, this time you don't walk in the hero's shoes. Not only will you see the fantasy world from a new perspective, but you can also experience how a dark lord is born!

Difficulty options to match your playing style
Do you just want to enjoy getting through the story or are you eager to challenge mighty foes? This game's difficulty modes range from Combat-free Mode to Extreme Mode to meet different playing styles!

Turn-based combat without the grind
No grinding or item farming! Winning in combat relies on strategy, so put the strengths of your allies to good use and exploit the weaknesses of your enemies!

A new series that reboots Dark Lord: Peacemaker
This game is the prologue to the Peacemaker Series, which reboots the original Dark Lord: Peacemaker game. The series expands on the Peacemaker story and world while retaining the atmosphere of the original.
